name: Its Simple, SHOOT
description: Its Simple, SHOOT! Is a minimalist top down 2D waveshooter that has the player utilizing various weapons and abilities to overcome their foes.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 2047MB NVIDIA GeForce GT 750M DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 70 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 2047MB NVIDIA GeForce GT 750M DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 70 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
